statements: DELETE FROM online_assessment WHERE assessment_id = 101 AND completion_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM online_assessment WHERE score > 90 AND assessment_name = 'Final Exam';
DELETE FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_name = 'Math Quiz'
DELETE FROM assessments WHERE id = 1 AND learner_id = 5;
DELETE FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_name = 'Math Quiz' AND total_questions > 10;
DELETE FROM learners WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Results WHERE quiz_id = 1 AND marks_obtained < 50
